lead_paragraph: HALBORG--Rev. John T.,on March 28, 2016. Pastor Our Lady of Victory, Mount Vernon - November 29, 1980 and St. Thomas More Church, NYC. Fond brother of Dorothy Kolber. Dear uncle of David Nelson. Mass of Christian Burial at St. Margaret of Cortona Church, 6000 Riverdale Avenue (West 260 St.) Bronx, NY 10471 on Thursday, March 31, at 10am. Interment to follow at St. Raymond's Cemetery. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HALBORG, REV. JOHN T.
